front.title: DTNMA Application Data Model (ADM) YANG Syntax

author.organization: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory

abstract.t: This document defines a concrete syntax for encoding a Delay-Tolerant Networking Management Architecture (DTNMA) Application Data Model (ADM) using the syntax and modular structure, but not the full data model, of YANG. Extensions to YANG are defined to capture the specifics needed to define DTNMA Application Management Model (AMM) objects and to use the Application Resource Identifier (ARI) data- value syntax.
